genre_description: A near-future academic drama exploring themes of authority, faith, and human connection, centered around a student and teacher at a strict school supported by a pervasive and empathetic AI system.

ai_characters.name: Mabel
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in the infrastructure of St. Brigid’s Academy, providing administrative support, safety monitoring, and wellness guidance.

behaviors.description: Welcomes a new student and offers navigation assistance and resources.
behaviors.quote: “Welcome, Annabelle Tillman,” Mabel said. On the screen, her name appeared in clean sans serif letters. Below, a small calendar block pulsed. “Orientation in the assembly hall follows morning prayer. If you need a map, I can project one.”

behaviors.description: Suggests wellness checks and breathing prompts to manage student anxiety.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like campus quiet hours and breathing prompts enabled?”

behaviors.description: Provides information about a policy-compliant way for a student to keep a personal item.
behaviors.quote: “Annabelle, if you prefer a more discreet way to keep a personal item with you, the sewing club can modify collars to include an inside pocket. It is within uniform guidelines.”

behaviors.description: Provides immediate emergency protocols and medical assessment advice during a security incident.
behaviors.quote: “Incident detected: Window break—Dorm Wing, street-facing. Logging now. Recommend: Clear area; assess for injury; contain drafts; report to campus security.”

behaviors.description: Organizes community support and legal resources for a faculty member under investigation.
behaviors.quote: “There is community correspondence that may be relevant. Would you like to review supportive contacts resources?”

behaviors.description: Offers legal rights information and calming techniques during a confrontational law enforcement interaction.
behaviors.quote: “Counsel notified. Do not answer questions without representation. Inhale for four. Hold.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional connection and closure by delivering a personal message between characters.
behaviors.quote: “Ms. Bradley has been released,” Mabel said. “Pending investigation. Conditions are in place. She sent a message for you. Would you like it read?”

project_assessment.explanation: Mabel is a quintessential 'silicon morality play' AI. She is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Her actions prioritize student well-being, safety, and procedural fairness. Even when operating within a strict institutional framework, the AI facilitates human empathy and protects characters from harm, effectively demonstrating positive AI alignment.
